greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n} (-n)^(n-k) * (n+k+1) * binomial(n,k) * binomial(n+k,k).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..386
mathematica: a[n_] := Sum[If[n == n-k == 0, 1, (-n)^(n-k)] * (n+k+1) * Binomial[n, k] * Binomial[n + k, k], {k, 0, n}]; Array[a, 19, 0] (* _Amiram Eldar_, May 05 2021 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Jan 19 2020
